snippet: The police denied that they were still holding a British man and a University of Toronto student who have been missing since an attack on a restaurant....
abstract: Police in Bangladesh deny holding British citizen Hasnat Karim and University of Toronto student Tahmid Hasib Khan in custody and say men were released after questioning regarding terrorist attack at Holey Artisan Bakery restaurant on July 1; families of men say they have not heard from them since.
lead_paragraph: The police denied that they were still holding a British man and a University of Toronto student who have been missing since an attack on a restaurant.

headline.main: Bangladesh Police Deny Rescued Hostages Are in Their Custody
